casebody.data:
Robinson and others vs. Applegate. CERTIORARI. The judgment of a justice entered in figures, will be reversed.

*212Ryall, for the plaintiff in certiorari, moved to reverse the judgment of the justice, because the judgment as entered on *179] *his docket, was in figures. The fact was made-manifest to the court, by the justice’s return to a rule of this court.

By the Court.

Let the judgment be reversed for the reason assigned.
